title: Altium PCB Layout - Upwork
description: We are looking for an experienced Altium PCB designer, that is familiar with Surface mount technology, High Speed design (500MHz), Controlled Impedance rules/PCB stackups, Net Length Equalization, and trace shielding.  The freelancer will need to evaluate the board/schematics, and calculate the number of layers that will be required to route the PCB.  Then the freelancer needs to contact a PCB manufacturer (or our engineering team) to get the PCB stackup and routing widths/spacing for single or differential pair traces.  Standard design rules concerning power/ground planes under controlled impedance traces must be observed.  The freelancer is only responsible for delivering a fully routed board.  Documentation is not required since it will be handled by our engineering team during the design review. This is what the freelancer should expect to receive:     a) Full schematics (in Altium Designer)     b) All PCB footprints will be included with the package     c) Key components (ie connectors, mounting holes, etc) placed on the PCB which cannot be moved     d) PCB shape and size defined Deliverables:     a) Finished PCB layout (fully routed board)     b) Design rule check with 0 errors     c) all routing must be in metric (default route/space = 0.2mm/0.2mm - for simple boards)     d) Number of layers should be kept to a minimum, and will be evaluated by our engineers.     e) Vias in pad can be used     f) Blind Vias/Buried Vias are discouraged, and must be approved by our engineering team prior to using them. What the freelancer does NOT need to deliver:     a) Clean up of the silkscreen layers     b) Clean up of the Assy layers     c) PCB panelization     d) Manufacturing notes     e) Engineering Title block We are not familiar with each other's methods, so the freelancer is encouraged to ask questions when design issues are not clear.  If this description has not scared you, the way we want this to work is:     1- Interested freelancers contact us.     2- We will select 1 or 2 freelancers to start, and deliver the complete design package.     3- We would prefer to get a fixed price for the work and an approximate delivery date     4- If accepted, we will start the job by putting the agreed upon payment in escrow     5- After the freelancer completes the design and delivers the layout, we will require 1-5 business days for our engineering department to review the work, and either accept the work or issue comments on how to fix the problems. The initial board that you will be quoting:     1- Size: 30mm x 30mm     2- less than 200 components     3- Controlled impedance: yes     4- Matched Length: yes     5- Differential pairs: yes     6- High Speed design: 500MHzSkills: Multilayer PCB, Altium Designer, PCB Design
